member.name: T:NationalInstruments.SemiconductorTestLibrary.Examples.NIDCPower.MergePinGroup.TestSteps
member.summary: This class contains example of how to use the MergePinGroup and UnmergePinGroup functions in the Instrument Abstractions from the Semiconductor Test Library. Specifically, how to merge Pin Groups for forcing high current and measure voltage for pins mapped to DCPower Instruments from same module. Later unmerge the pin group to disconnect the pins and instrumentation after the test is complete.
member.remarks: Note that only few DCPower Instruments support merging feature which includes PXIe-4147, PXIe-4162 and PXIe-4163. This also requires the pinmap to define the pingroup to contain all the pins to be merged and each pin is mapped to SMU channels of same module. This example assumes: - Relay configurations to be applied before the merging operation ensures the SMUs channels are connected in parallel configuration and disconnect after unmerging.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.SemiconductorTestLibrary.Examples.NIDCPower.MergePinGroup.TestSteps.MergeSmuPinGroup(NationalInstruments.TestStand.SemiconductorModule.CodeModuleAPI.ISemiconductorModuleContext,System.String,System.Double,System.String)
member.param: Name of the pin group to be merged
Relay configuration that connects all the channels in parallel

member.summary: Merges the specified pin group to force high current and measure voltage for pins mapped to DCPower Instruments from same module. Specifically, this method merges the pin group, forces a voltage level, measures the current, and then unmerges the pin group.
member.param: Name of the pin group to be merged
Relay configuration that connects all the channels in parallel
Relay configuration that disconnects all the channels

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.SemiconductorTestLibrary.Examples.NIDCPower.MergePinGroup.TestSteps.PowerDownAndUnmergeSmuPinGroup(NationalInstruments.TestStand.SemiconductorModule.CodeModuleAPI.ISemiconductorModuleContext,System.String,System.Double,System.String)
member.summary: Power down the bundle and then unmerge the pin group.
member.param: Name of the pin group to be merged
Relay configuration that disconnects all the channels
